description:
Kate Winslet is forming a little Rocknroll band.凯特·温斯莱特正在组建一个小型“摇滚乐队”。（凯特丈夫姓氏是Rocknroll，而Rock n' Roll也是摇滚乐的意思）

The British actress and husband Ned Rocknroll are expecting their first child together, E! News confirmed Tuesday.这位英国演员怀上了和丈夫内德·罗克努尔的第一个孩子。E! NEWS在周二确认了这一消息。

"Kate and Ned are delighted," says Winslet's rep.凯特的发言人称：“凯特和内德都十分开心。”

This will be Winslet's third child. The Oscar winner is also mum to 12-year-old daughterMia with first ex-husband Jim Threapleton and 9-year-old son Joe, with ex-hubby No. 2 Sam Mendes.这也是温丝莱特的第三个孩子。这位奥斯卡得主和第一任丈夫吉姆·塞普莱顿有一个12岁的女儿，和第二任丈夫萨姆·门德斯有一个9岁的儿子。

Winslet, 37, and Rocknroll, 34, a nephew of billionaire Virgin mogul Richard Branson, quietly tied the knot in December after about a year and a half of dating.去年12月，37岁的凯特和34岁的罗克努尔（英国亿万富翁理查德·布兰森的侄子）结束了一年半的约会，结为夫妻。

The Titanic star told InStyle back in 2006 that she was "hoping to have more kids...I don't know whether one or two. Oh, God, I would love to have more."这位泰坦尼克女主角2006年在接受InStyle采访时说：“我希望有很多孩子……我不知道是一个还是两个。天啊，我很想要很多孩子。”

title: Rose又怀孕了！凯特温斯莱特40岁怀上第三子
